item.title: Welcome to the newest edition of TTS San Antonio! Laura Ruiz-Roehrs will be joining as an instructor for our upcoming JavaScript Application Development course If you are interested in taking her course, go visit us at: https://hubs.ly/H0l9BFv0 pic.twitter.com/yIEpL4Hq4U

item.title: Are you a soon-to-be or recent college grad wondering what your next move should be? TTS's Graduate Accelerator Program offers training to recent college grads to get you those skills (even if you've never coded before!)...and it's all on us. Apply here: https://hubs.ly/H0l0qKf0 pic.twitter.com/YMTzslgHTs
item.dc:creator: (@TechTalentSouth)
item.description: Are you a soon-to-be or recent college grad wondering what your next move should be? Apply here: https://hubs.ly/H0l0qKf0  pic.twitter.com/YMTzslgHTs

item.title: Curious about coding but not sure where to begin? Come learn about upcoming events and coding classes in the area - no technical skills necessary! Webinar attendees also receive a special discount code for your next class. Time to build your coding skills! https://hubs.ly/H0l0ld70 pic.twitter.com/WLjk8yziyp
item.dc:creator: (@TechTalentSouth)

item.title: TTS NOLA had an awesome time hosting our Recruiting Technical Talent panel! Many thanks to Nicole Patel, Chief People Officer at Lucid, Michael Cross, Vice President of Innovation at Entergy, and Lee Rea, Recruitment Relationship Manager at DXC Technology for joining uspic.twitter.com/N1s4MxZyLt

item.title: Speed Dating with Recruiters was a hit! Nearly 60 job seekers had the opportunity to interview with DXC, Accruent, Entergy, Search Influence, Susco Solutions, TEKsystems, ResolvIT and CGI Federal. Thank you so much to Loyola University of New Orleans for hosting us!pic.twitter.com/ZDkLbdsECR
item.dc:creator: (@TechTalentSouth)
item.description: Speed Dating with Recruiters was a hit! Thank you so much to Loyola University of New Orleans for hosting us! pic.twitter.com/ZDkLbdsECR

item.title:
The tech industry is invading sports parks all over the country this summer! Join your TTS community for a fun night out at your local ballpark. Click here to find the next Tech Me Out to the Ballgame event happening in your city!
https://hubs.ly/H0jSx970 pic.twitter.com/z1CormqkdY

item.title: Join Tech Talent South and Launch Pad on Thursday June 27th for Tech Talks where we will highlight local players in NOLA tech for 15 minute lightning round talks. Snacks and drinks will be provided, curtesy of Launch Pad. RSVP here: https://hubs.ly/H0jr35V0 pic.twitter.com/V7L9gqUdQS
item.dc:creator: (@TechTalentSouth)
